availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, iron manufacturer. Ohio native. Married to Mary H. Tarvin Phillips in Kenton County on February 3, 1857. Father of Josephine Phillips, Ovid Phillips, Mabel Phillips, and Lidia Phillips. Butcher in Cincinnati, Ohio in 1850. Iron manufacturer in Covington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Cincinnati, Ward 11, p. 354B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington, Ward 3, p. 142.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Buena Vista Precinct, p. 6.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994027-994058, Kenton County Marriages, p. 16.
